participant_1.background:
My family is supportive of my career and enjoys vacationing with me.
i have pink hair.
I've never been in a fight, but I have been warned for riding my horse too fast.
my favorite book is enders game.
My worst moment was when my salon was robbed.

participant_2.background:
I value the memories I've made with my friends and family.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.
My children are my only living family members.
i now live in new mexico.
I am looking for a partner who is willing to be a parent to my children.

content.text: Not much, just enjoying my morning coffee.  You?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking.  I'm just getting ready for work.
I'm a hairstylist at a salon.  I love my job!
That's awesome!  I'm a stay at home mom, I love my kids but I miss having a career.
I totally understand that!  I have two kids, but they're both in school now so I can work.  My favorite thing about my job is getting to meet new people every day.
That's so great!  I met all of my friends through my kids' school and activities, but it would be fun to meet new people outside of that.
Yeah, I definitely agree.  It's always nice to have friends who can relate to your job.
Totally!  So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go horseback riding, I've been riding since I was a kid.
That sounds really fun!  I've always wanted to learn how to ride a horse.
It's not as hard as you might think, and it's a lot of fun!  I'd be happy to teach you sometime.
That would be awesome!  I'd love to learn.
Great!  We can set something up soon
